${ModID}:CrescentSweep.NAME: Heel Tornado
${ModID}:CrescentSweep.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Manifest ${ModID}:Crescent_Moon。

${ModID}:MysticFlourish.NAME: Tetsuzanko
${ModID}:MysticFlourish.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Activate the passive effect of your next orb
${ModID}:MysticFlourish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Activate the passive effect of your next orb twice

${ModID}:FullMoonHalo.NAME: Full Moon Halo
${ModID}:FullMoonHalo.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Manifest ${ModID}:Full_Moon。

${ModID}:MoonlightBarrage.NAME: Moonlight Barrage
${ModID}:MoonlightBarrage.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 to a random enemy for each channeled orb。

${ModID}:ChitteringPunt.NAME: Chittering Punt
${ModID}:ChitteringPunt.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL When this ${ModID}:infests ${ModID}:Manifest ${ModID}:Crescent_Moon。

${ModID}:HornetWithin.NAME: Hornet Within
${ModID}:HornetWithin.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL When this ${ModID}:Infests, Evoke your next orb !M! times 并失去 an Orb slot。

${ModID}:WitchTwist.NAME: Witch Twist
${ModID}:WitchTwist.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:修改 !M! random cards in your h并: ${ModID}:铭印. NL 获得 !${ModID}:m2! Focus. NL 消耗

${ModID}:MoonlightFlight.NAME: Moonlight Flight
${ModID}:MoonlightFlight.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you channel an orb 获得 !M! Focus until your next turn。

${ModID}:ScarabPlague.NAME: Scarab Plague
${ModID}:ScarabPlague.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Infest. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL When this ${ModID}:infests, ${ModID}:Manifest ${ModID}:Full_Moon。
